Title: Marketing Executive
Likes:
products on the market, the general sales rate, a list of companies that produce the product and how much it is selling for. A research report will reveal whether the market for the specific product is saturated or indeed a ripe business opportunity. The first step is conducting research to ensure there is a need or demand for the product in question.
Business proposal
A business proposal is a document that suggests a method for completing a task, whether it is launching a new product or implementing a new marketing campaign. A proposal includes a brief description of the task at hand, a section describing the general approach to the task, a schedule for the task in question and a budget that outlines all expenses associated with the task. Detailed proposals include an outlook section that predicts how the company will benefit from this particular approach. This is common for projects that have several proposal submissions.
Once the company establishes that there is a market for it, employees prepare several proposals about how to manufacturer a high-quality product for the lowest manufacturing costs.

A formal research report provides basic information and statistics in a given field or industry, depending on the focus decided by the company. A company may research the demand for a specific product by researching similar products on the market, the general sales rate, a list of companies that produce the product and how much it is selling for. A research report will reveal whether the market for the specific product is saturated or indeed a ripe business opportunity. The first step is conducting research to ensure there is a need or demand for the product in question.

Title: State Part Sales Coordinator - Sales And Business Development
Senior Manager(CSM)
Likes:
Bad things:
CSM(CVBU) life is the worst.. no balance of work and personal life.. If you don't pick up the phone at mid nights of CAC calls then your boss will reflect the same during ratings. 
L3 management takes credit for all the good things no matter what life risking effort L4(ASM) and L5(CSM) are giving. Basically once you starts asking questions and raising support for concern areas you will become a member of hit list. They (L3) will never guide you about how to do but will ask for results although in some region exceptional people are there who are true leaders and they really cares for their juniors.
Unnecessary review by top management in every week and no time for implementation of the same.
Handling CAC calls along with customers for 3.3hrs(counted) apart from this other calls(Daily call count avg 110-130), unnecessary meetings(VC) will block your entire calendar for the day and EOD you will be asked what have you done.
 
Due to poor middle management(in some region) bottom employees are struggling and middle management showing creamy dreamy world to top management.
Good things:
Ocean of learning.
Good policies specially health.
Good travel policy.
Job security was good but middle management will keep on threatening.
Once you join you will get a good grip on your technical skills.
Advice to company:
Please don't think that CSM can work for 24/7 either start with shift working or appoint breakdown teams at each AO or cluster wise....Read More
Dislikes: 24/7 working, No work life balance, unnecessary weekly review by top management where there is no direction or sop derivatives.

Title: Machane Operator
Likes:
job security is the main concern, i worked on contract basis. If company is shutdown due to material shortage our leaves are deducted..we get 12-14 days leave but material shortage days are 10-20 days .hence our salary will b deducted even if it is companies mistake to not get material on time.
You are always kept in under a carrot approach that you will be given a permanent job if u stay overtime and do extra work for free.
transport also is charged for contractual employees.Rs 1000 per month.
as a contractual you are given step motherly treatment and not even invited for funtions and not even given medical cover.
You are placed lowest (contractual) in hierarchy and not given importance even if u r talented .
Other things are fine...Dont join company on contract basis.you will get 20000 on paper. after deduction transport..pf and shutdown days you will be handed 13000-15000 in hand .
If you get permanent job then only join this company...Read More
Dislikes: Working nature ,best organisation to gain  knowledge,safety regulation
